body:
Comment 3 by **kfmfe04**: 
what I meant in my last comment is "TZ in the abstract", not necessarily the
environmental variable

it's totally up to the library designer/maintainer to decide to follow old conventions
(TZ env var is a very old convention, I believe) or to create something new and better

as a user of the lib, as long as I have to way to do what I need to do, I'm happy

for now, I will patch my local version - ty
